name: Mathias H. Fredlund
quote: Bedir showed curiosity, discipline, and fast adaptation in our project at Custellence. He took responsibility and grew steadily as a developer.

name: Rob Chamberlain
quote: Bedir is an exceptionally engaged and fast-learning student. His strong frontend skills and collaborative spirit made him a great asset.

name: Tove Lundell
quote: During his internship, Bedir displayed professionalism, a willingness to learn, and the ability to handle tasks independently and effectively.
